title: s_scripts
author: s_scripts
content: I personally don't have time for this project anymore. It is a Bitcoin Script Marketplace and the domain is really good.Comes with admin panel to check money flow.I've done a little bit of advertising.Project was uniquely coded by me with PHP, MySQL and Javascript.Hit me with your offers
